page.title: 03HUDDFIELD TOWN FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: The ground is 77 years old and has gone through good and bad times. Hudersfield were champions of the 1st division, now they are in the second division. There is seating for 5,8OO people. The largest crowd was 67,OOO but new safety rules mean only 31,OOO can attend now - they don't. Huddersfield gets about 25O,OOO spectators a year. The pitch is 117 yards long and 77 yards wide, the grass is cut 3 times a week - the groundsman walks 6 miles every week just cutting the grass. There are 3 groundsmen and 6 cleaners to keep the stadium clean and working. Sometimes, not often, the ground is used for Pop concerts,but no one is allowed on the turf.
